scripts.unitDied:
unitB = lastDeadUnitKiller() unitA = lastDeadUnit()
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'octopus' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB) , 10) x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('octopus', unitFaction(unitA), {x1, y1})
end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'stingray' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB) , 25) x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('stingray', unitFaction(unitA), {x1, y1})
end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'perch' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB) , 3) x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('perch', unitFaction(unitA), {x1, y1})
end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'lion_fish' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB) , 5) x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('lion_fish', unitFaction(unitA), {x1, y1})
end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'pike' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB) , 8) x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('pike', unitFaction(unitA), {x1, y1})
end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'sculpin' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB) , 4) x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('sculpin', unitFaction(unitA), {x1, y1})
end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'giant_crab' then
giveResource('food', unitFaction(unitB) , 100) x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('giant_crab', unitFaction(unitA), {x1, y1})
end end end
if lastDeadUnitCauseOfDeath() ~= 3 then
if unitFaction(unitB) ~= unitFaction(unitA) then
if lastDeadUnitName() == 'pirate_ship' then
giveResource('diamond', unitFaction(unitB) , 1)
end end end
if lastDeadUnit()== s1 then
removeCellMarker(0, {160, 188}) giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 20)
x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('salvage', 6, {x1, y1})
end
if lastDeadUnit()== s2 then
removeCellMarker(0, {92, 64}) giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 20)
x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('salvage', 6, {x1, y1})
end
if lastDeadUnit()== s3 then
removeCellMarker(0, {164, 116}) giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 20)
x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('salvage', 6, {x1, y1})
end
if lastDeadUnit()== s4 then
removeCellMarker(0, {60, 218}) giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 20)
x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('salvage', 6, {x1, y1})
end
if lastDeadUnit()== s5 then
removeCellMarker(0, {98, 209}) giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 20)
x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('salvage', 6, {x1, y1})
end
if lastDeadUnit()== s6 then
removeCellMarker(0, {48, 114}) giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 20) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 20)
x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) createUnit('salvage', 6, {x1, y1})
end
if lastDeadUnitName()=='raft' then
createUnit('worker_', 0, startLocation(0)) setCameraPosition(startLocation(0))
end
if lastDeadUnitName()=='raft___' then
createUnit('raft', 0, {38, 114}) setCameraPosition({38, 114})
end
if lastDeadUnitName()=='war_ship' then createUnit('raft___', 0, {38, 114}) you=lastCreatedUnit() setCameraPosition({38, 114})
end
if lastDeadUnitName()=='worker' then
createUnit('worker', 0, startLocation(0)) setCameraPosition(startLocation(0))
end
if lastDeadUnitName()=='worker_' then
createUnit('worker_', 0, startLocation(0)) setCameraPosition(startLocation(0))
end
if lastDeadUnitName()=='black_pearl' then
showMessage('m01', 'intro') setDisplayText('ob4') togglePauseGame(1); giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 200) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 200) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 200)
createUnit('man_of_war', 3, startLocation(2)) mow = lastCreatedUnit() highlightUnit(mow,1,0.2,{-1,-1,-1,-1}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {12, 16}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {140, 16}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {238, 40}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {234, 150}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {226, 198}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {206, 246}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {152, 242}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {92, 242}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {20, 204}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {166, 98}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {12, 16}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {140, 16}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {238, 40}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {234, 150}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {226, 198}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {206, 246}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {152, 242}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {92, 242}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {20, 204}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {166, 98})
end
if lastDeadUnit()== mow then
showMessage('m02', 'intro') setDisplayText('ob04') togglePauseGame(1);
giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 200) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 200) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 200)
createUnit('dutchman', 2, startLocation(2))
createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {12, 16}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {140, 16}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {238, 40}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {234, 150}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {226, 198}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {206, 246}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {152, 242}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {92, 242}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {20, 204}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {166, 98}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {12, 16}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {140, 16}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {238, 40}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {234, 150}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {226, 198}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {206, 246}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {152, 242}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {92, 242}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {20, 204}) createUnit('pirate_ship', 1, {166, 98})
end
if lastDeadUnitName()=='dutchman' then
showMessage('m2', 'intro') showMessage('m3', 'intro') setDisplayText('ob5')
giveResource('gold', unitFaction(unitB), 200) giveResource('wood', unitFaction(unitB), 200) giveResource('stone', unitFaction(unitB), 200)
createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {12, 16}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {140, 16}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {238, 40}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {234, 150}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {226, 198}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {206, 246}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {152, 242}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {92, 242}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {20, 204}) createUnit('giant_crab', 4, {166, 98})
createUnit('temple', 0, {245, 110}) temple=lastCreatedUnit() togglePauseGame(1);
cell_event = registerCellTriggerEventForUnitToUnit(you, temple)
end
scripts.cellTriggerEvent:
if triggeredCellEventId() == cell_event then
showMessage('m4', 'intro') togglePauseGame(1);
unregisterCellTriggerEvent(cell_event); cell_event2 = registerCellTriggerEventForUnitToLocation(you, {245, 110}) end
if triggeredCellEventId() == cell_event2 then
setPlayerAsWinner(0) endGame()
unregisterCellTriggerEvent(cell_event2); end
if triggeredCellEventId() == dutchmanemerge then
morphToUnit(dutchmansubmerged, 'dutchman' , 1)
unregisterCellTriggerEvent(dutchmanemerge); end
scripts.unitCreatedOfType: if unitCountOfType(0, 'war_ship')>=1 then you = lastCreatedUnit() end
if unitCountOfType(6, 'salvage')>=1 then salvage = lastCreatedUnit() end
if unitCountOfType(0, 'raft_')>=1 then r = lastCreatedUnit() createUnit('raft', 0, {38, 114}) setCameraPosition({38, 114}) destroyUnit(r) setDisplayText('ob2') giveResource('food', 0, 30) end
if unitCountOfType(0, 'raft__')>=1 then r = lastCreatedUnit() createUnit('raft', 0, {38, 114}) setCameraPosition({38, 114}) destroyUnit(r) end
if unitCountOfType(0, 'raft___')>=1 then you = lastCreatedUnit() giveResource('food', 0, 30) end
if unitCountOfType(0, 'raft')>=1 then you = lastCreatedUnit() setDisplayText('ob2') end
if unitCountOfType(2, 'dutchman_')>=1 then dutchmansubmerged = lastCreatedUnit() end

if unitCountOfType(2, 'dutchman')>=1 then dutchman = lastCreatedUnit() highlightUnit(dutchman,1,0.2,{0,1,0,0.8})
end
scripts.unitTriggerEvent: if getUnitProperty(lastUnitTriggerEventUnit(),lastUnitTriggerEventType()) and lastUnitTriggerEventType() == 1 then x1 = getRandomGen(36, 255) y1 = getRandomGen(1, 255) if getUnitProperty(dutchman,1) <= 2000 then dutchMoveSent = 0 dutchMoveSubmerged = 1 morphToUnit(dutchman, dutchman_, 1) if dutchMoveSubmerged == 0 then givePositionCommand(dutchmansubmerged, move, {x1,y1}) dutchMoveSubmerged = 1 end dutchmanemerge = registerCellTriggerEventForUnitToLocation(dutchmansubmerged, {x1, y1}) elseif getUnitProperty(dutchman,1) <= 3000 then dutchMoveSubmerged = 0 if dutchMoveSent == 0 then givePositionCommand(dutchman, move, {x1,y1}) dutchMoveSent = 1 end end end
